Posts

  • Mar 24, 2017 Data Driven South Park We perform data analysis and some basic natural language processing on 70,000 lines of South Park dialog. We then train a recurrent neural network on the South Park dialog.
  • Mar 18, 2017 The Most Metal Guitar Tuning We investigate the age-old question What is the most metal guitar tuning.
  • Feb 28, 2017 The Mathematics of Lights Out Lights Out is a puzzle game that was originally produced by Tiger Electronics in 1995, and we take a look at the math behind it.
  • Jan 19, 2017 100 Books Read in 2016 A listing and one sentence summary of the books I read in 2016.
  • Oct 19, 2016 An Android App for Distinguishing Clouds from Contrails Using Machine Learning Adventures in training an image classifier to determine clouds from contrails.
  • Oct 8, 2016 Twitter Sentiment Analysis for the First 2016 Presidential Debate After the first presidential debate between Hillary Clinton and Donald Trump, what is the mood on Twitter?
  • Aug 18, 2016 A Neural Network in TensorFlow for Classifying Cancer Data Using UCI breast cancer data, we build a simple neural network classifier in TensorFlow to determine is a tumor is benign or malignant.
  • May 18, 2016 Data Analysis in R of the 2016 Michigan Primary Election On March 8th, 2016, Michigan (my home state) held the presidential primary for the 2016 presidential election. We take a dive into the data.
